A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel Johnson wasted the potential plotline of the Force Awakens and the earlier films for something that I feel did not work and it puzzles me that the Lucasfilm story group allowed this film to be done. I am cautiously optimistic for IX but Lucasfilm should have been incorporating not just the original trilogy but also the prequels to these final films in the saga. I hope they bring proper closure to the original saga and respect what came before. The mantra of killling the past in this movie is one of the worst things I ever heard. It reminds me of my idiot classmates in school that would not watch anything that was older than them. Oh Well.
